SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository

Class OperationRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.OperationRepository
public class OperationRepository extends Object
Repository class that manages operations associated with machines. This class allows for the addition and retrieval of operations.

    • OperationRepository

      public OperationRepository(List<Item> items)
      Constructs an OperationRepository instance. Initializes the set to hold operations.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • addOperation

      public Optional<Operation> addOperation(Operation operation)
      Adds an operation to the repository if it is not already present.
      Parameters:
      operation - the operation to be added
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the cloned operation if added successfully, or empty if it was already present

    • fillOperations

      public void fillOperations(List<Item> items)
      Populates the operations list with operations extracted from the provided items. This method iterates over each item in the provided list and retrieves the list of operations associated with each item. Each operation is cloned to ensure that the original operation objects are not modified when added to the operations list. The cloned operations are then added to the internal list of operations.
      Parameters:
      items - a list of Item objects from which operations are extracted and added to the operations list.

    • getOperations

      public List<Operation> getOperations()
      Retrieves a list of all operations in the repository.
      Returns:
      a list containing all operations

    • getAllOperations

      public Optional<List<Operation>> getAllOperations()
      Retrieves all operations from the operations list.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing a list of operations if available; otherwise, an empty Optional.

    • registerOperation

      public Optional<Operation> registerOperation(String name, String description)
      Registers a new operation with the given name and description.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the operation to be registered.
      description - The description of the operation.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the registered operation if successful; otherwise, an empty Optional.

    • registerOperation

      public Optional<Operation> registerOperation(String name)
      Registers a new operation with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the operation to be registered.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the registered operation if successful; otherwise, an empty Optional.
